articles.author: Tuhin Das Mahapatra
articles.title: US says it's 'reasonable to assess' that Israel violated international humanitarian law using American weapons - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Biden administration has not definitively stated that Israel has breached international humanitarian law, but it's “reasonable to assess” that they may have
articles.content: The Biden administration came out on Friday and said that it is reasonable to assess that the American weapons that Israel used in Gaza are inconsistent and abuse of international humanitarian law an… [+3618 chars]

articles.author: Jennifer Hansler, Kylie Atwood
articles.title: Biden admin says it’s ‘reasonable to assess’ Israel used American weapons in ways ‘inconsistent’ with international law - CNN
articles.description: The Biden administration said Friday that it is “reasonable to assess” that US weapons have been used by Israeli forces in Gaza in ways that are “inconsistent” with international humanitarian law but stopped short of officially saying Israel violated the law.
articles.content: The Biden administration said Friday that it is reasonable to assess that US weapons have been used by Israeli forces in Gaza in ways that are inconsistent with international humanitarian law but sto… [+10385 chars]
